content:
TITLE: Sample SymmetricDS Client Implementation in C
DESCRIPTION: Example C code demonstrating how to use the SymmetricDS C library API. It shows how to connect to a SQLite database, configure properties, start the engine, pull data from a server, and properly clean up resources.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-client-clib/README.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: C
CODE:
```
#include "libsymclient.h"

int main() {
    SymProperties *prop = SymProperties_new(NULL);
    prop->put(prop, SYM_PARAMETER_DB_URL, "sqlite:file:data.db");
    prop->put(prop, SYM_PARAMETER_GROUP_ID, "client");
    prop->put(prop, SYM_PARAMETER_EXTERNAL_ID, "001");
    prop->put(prop, SYM_PARAMETER_REGISTRATION_URL, "http://localhost:31415/sync/server");

    SymEngine *engine = SymEngine_new(NULL, prop);
    engine->start(engine);

    engine->pullService->pull_data(engine->pullService);

    engine->stop(engine);
    engine->destroy(engine);
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running SymmetricDS Container with Persistent Volumes
DESCRIPTION: Complete command to start SymmetricDS with HTTP and mount three persistent volumes for engines, conf, and security directories. This configuration enables data to persist even if the container is stopped or removed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-assemble/Dockerfile.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
docker run -p 31415:31415 --name sym -v sym-engines:/opt/symmetric-ds/engines -v sym-conf:/opt/symmetric-ds/conf -v sym-security:/opt/symmetric-ds/security jumpmind/symmetricds
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running SymmetricDS Container with HTTP
DESCRIPTION: Command to start a SymmetricDS container exposing the HTTP port 31415. This creates a container named 'sym' using the jumpmind/symmetricds image.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-assemble/Dockerfile.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
docker run -p 31415:31415 --name sym jumpmind/symmetricds
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up SymmetricDS Development Environment with Gradle
DESCRIPTION: Commands to generate Eclipse projects for SymmetricDS development. This setup process uses Gradle to create the necessary project files that can be imported into an Eclipse workspace.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
cd symmetric-assemble
./gradlew develop
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Mounting Individual Volumes for SymmetricDS Container
DESCRIPTION: Commands to mount separate Docker volumes for the engines, tmp, conf, and security directories. These can be added to the run command to persist SymmetricDS configuration across container instances.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-assemble/Dockerfile.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
-v sym-engines:/opt/symmetric-ds/engines
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
-v sym-tmp:/opt/symmetric-ds/tmp
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
-v sym-conf:/opt/symmetric-ds/conf
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
-v sym-security:/opt/symmetric-ds/security
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building a Custom SymmetricDS Docker Image
DESCRIPTION: Command to build a custom Docker image for SymmetricDS. This builds an image from the Dockerfile in the current directory and tags it as 'symmetricds'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-assemble/Dockerfile.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
docker build -t symmetricds .
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including SQL Explorer Component with Gradle
DESCRIPTION: This Gradle configuration demonstrates how to include the SQL Explorer component in a project. It sets up the necessary repositories and adds the component as a dependency. Note that this will require compiling the Vaadin widgetset due to addon dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-sqlexplorer/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: gradle
CODE:
```
repositories {
  mavenCentral()    
  jcenter()        
  maven { url "http://maven.vaadin.com/vaadin-addons" }  
  maven { url "http://maven.jumpmind.com/repo" }
}

dependencies {
  compile 'org.jumpmind.symmetric:symmetric-sqlexplorer:3.9.x-SNAPSHOT'
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building SymmetricDS C Library Client
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build the SymmetricDS C library client using Eclipse CDT-generated makefiles. It shows how to navigate to the appropriate directory and run the make command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-client-clib/README.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# cd symmetric-client-clib/Release
# make
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Connecting to a Running SymmetricDS Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to open an interactive shell session in a running SymmetricDS container named 'sym'. This allows for manual configuration on the container's file system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-assemble/Dockerfile.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
docker exec -it sym /bin/sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running SymmetricDS C Library Client Tests
DESCRIPTION: Commands to run the executable produced from the build, which executes all unit tests. It uses LD_LIBRARY_PATH to locate the shared library if not installed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-client-clib-test/README.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# cd symmetric-client-clib/Release
# LD_LIBRARY_PATH=../../symmetric-client-clib/Debug/ ./symclient_test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building SymmetricDS C Library Client using Make
DESCRIPTION: Commands to navigate to the project directory and build the project using the makefile generated by Eclipse CDT.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jumpmind/symmetric-ds/blob/3.16/symmetric-client-clib-test/README.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# cd symmetric-client-clib/Release
# make
```
